item.title: Weary managers of the world, get ready to learn a new skill: Leading all the AI agents and bots whose work you’ll be accountable for
item.description: The era when “team leadership” meant only humans is over. The savviest workers are now using multiple AI models.

item.title: California overbilled Medicaid $500 million to provide care for undocumented immigrants — and now Trump is cracking down
item.description: It’s not clear whether that money has been repaid.

item.title: You’re much more likely to get retrained than fired due to AI, but layoffs will rise, NY Fed says
item.description: Among service companies in the New York–northern New Jersey region that are using AI, 35% said they are retraining their workers, up from 24% last yea...

item.title: Billionaire Justin Sun begs Trump-backed World Liberty Financial to unfreeze $100 million crypto stash
item.description: The Chinese crypto tycoon, who is one of the project’s biggest backers, appears to have been blacklisted.

item.title: Multimillion-dollar restaurant CEO used to splurge on Range Rovers and McLarens—but he’s reining it in now because today’s economy makes no sense
